name: 伝創記IV ~if~
description: - Overview 1000 years has passed since the Holy Crusade. This is a story woven by the ancestors of Heroic lineage. Protagonist "Shin" is a young lad aiming to become a Doll Master. In order to pass his graduation examination, he must up his skills.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32bit Processor: intel core i ３ Memory: ２ GB RAM Graphics: on board gpu Storage: 810 MB available space Additional Notes: Display 1366x768 over
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64bit Processor: intel core i 5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: external gpu (Radeon, GeForce) Storage: 810 MB available space Additional Notes: Display 1366x768 over
